globalNotice.text: ⚠️ This is the 2025-05-05 Draft. A final schedule will be released in June.

banners.june-23: 📢 Welcome to Day 1! Don’t forget your instrument and water bottle!
banners.june-24: 🎬 Movie Night tonight! Bring your camp blanket!
banners.june-25: ⚡ Don’t miss the Greg Osby recital at 7:15 PM!
banners.june-26: 📸 Bring your camp shirt for the group photo!
banners.june-27: 🎉 Last full day! Let's go all out with team colors!
